name: Effective Healthcare Everywhere
socialShareText: Your donation will support the work of five groups that deliver life-changing solutions to places where healthcare is highly needed and access is limited.
about: Your donation will be split evenly between these five highly impactful nonprofits, that use evidence-based solutions to deliver life-changing healthcare to the places where the need is great, but access is limited.

nonprofits.name: Sightsavers
nonprofits.about: Protecting sight and fighting for disability rights.

nonprofits.name: Malaria Consortium
nonprofits.about: Prevention, control and treatment of malaria and other communicable diseases among vulnerable populations.

nonprofits.name: The Against Malaria Foundation
nonprofits.about: One of GiveWell's top charities for the past several years, AMF provides anti-malarial bednets to people in need.

nonprofits.name: Hellen Keller International
nonprofits.about: Helen Keller, our co-founder, envisioned a world without barriers to human potential. We are continuing her work.

nonprofits.name: Strong Minds
nonprofits.about: Provides life-changing mental health services to low-income Africans using an innovative community-based approach.
